title: Medical questionnaire
description: Answer questions about your health by filling out a questionnaire. The questionnaire will ask about your current use of weight loss medications, your medical history, including conditions like diabetes and high blood pressure, and personal details such as height, weight, and allergies. This helps us ensure the treatment is safe and appropriate for you. Once completed, our pharmacist will review your answers and get in touch.

title: Pharmacist review
description: Our pharmacist will provide a treatment plan within 24 hours and, if suitable, issue a prescription.

title: Discreet collection & delivery
description: Collect your treatment with confidence from our pharamcies or get them delivered directly to your door.

title: Weight loss support
description: Pharmacist follow-ups & additional weight loss support package (designed by our in-house nutritionist and our pharmacist).

title: Terms & conditions
description: The provider portal has information and tools to complete real-time transactions along with administrative and financial tools.
